MediaTrackSupportedConstraintsSuppressLo.summary: The dictionary's suppressLocalAudioPlayback property indicates whether or not the constraint is supported by the user agent and the device on which the content is being used.

remarks.para: The supported constraints list is obtained by calling .

MediaTrackSupportedConstraintsSuppressLo.value: A boolean value which is true if the constraint is supported by the device and user agent.
